extendedInfo.description: âKeep Fit Freeâ - A simple BMI/BMR/WHR calculators which supports multiple languages interfaces.âKeep Fit Freeâ is a totally free Android program application which designed for all age groups users who want to keep fit in a correct way. âKeep Fit Freeâ included 3 basic calculators (may add more in future) which let the users can calculate and monitor their Body Mass Index (BMI), Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Waist to Hip Ratio (WHR) by enter the related information simply, and all the above indexes will be explained in detail which can help the users to fully understand the different indexes and the status of their health easily.In fact, I am a part-time student in Hong Kong, and I am currently in my final year of the course â Bachelor of Science (Honours) Computer Networks. This application is a part of my final year project of model CCM 3422 âComputer Communications Projectâ. In the project, I need to create an application and then publish to the public after research, and then record the whole progress in this report completely.
